mapper.insert: insert into wageNew.dbo.person (p_name, p_sex, p_age, p_time, p_born, p_pass, pl_id, p_onduty, p_overtime) values (#{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{enterTime}, #{born}, #{pass}, #{placeId}, #{onDutyRate}, #{overTimeRate})
mapper.select: select top ${size} * from dbo.person where p_id not in ( select top ${offset} p_id from dbo.person )
select top ${size} p_id from dbo.person where p_id not in ( select top ${offset} p_id from dbo.person )
select case when count(*) = 0 then 0 else 1 end from person where p_name = #{name}
mapper.delete: delete from person where person.pl_id in (select pl_id from place where pl_dept_id = #{id})
